item.title: 中国经纪商富途全球扩张放缓，裁员 5
item.description: 中国在线经纪商富途控股有限公司（Futu Holdings Ltd.）正在裁员约 5%，以重新评估公司的全球扩张战略。【原文：China’s online brokerage Futu Holdings Ltd. is reducing its headcount by about 5% as it reassesses the firm’s strategy to expand globally.】

item.title: 日本央行上田表示下一次会议将在不确定结果的情况下举行
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫给出了迄今为止最明确的暗示，即央行下一次货币政策会议将就是否加息进行现场讨论。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda gave the clearest hint yet that the central bank’s next monetary policy meeting will involve a live discussion over whether to raise interest rates.】

item.title: 阿达尼市场波动后，韦丹塔暂停债券销售计划
item.description: 印度亿万富翁阿尼尔-阿加瓦尔（Anil Agarwal）控制的韦丹塔资源有限公司（Vedanta Resources Ltd.）正在重新评估可能出售美元债券的时机，此前美国对独立企业集团阿达尼集团（Adani Group）创始人的起诉加剧了市场波动。【原文：Vedanta Resources Ltd., controlled by Indian billionaire Anil Agarwal, is reassessing timing for a potential sale of dollar bonds, after a US indictment of the founder of separate conglomerate Adani Group fueled market volatility, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 阿达尼驳斥美国关于贿赂计划的指控毫无根据
item.description: 阿达尼集团否认了美国检察官对其亿万富翁创始人高塔姆-阿达尼及其助手参与推动一项超过 2.5 亿美元的贿赂计划以赢得印度太阳能合同的指控。【原文：The Adani Group denied US prosecutors’ charge that its billionaire founder Gautam Adani and his aides were involved in driving a more than $250 million bribery scheme to win Indian solar energy contracts.】

item.title: 法国商界大选阴霾笼罩前景
item.description: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）在 6 月份对临时大选进行了一场命运多舛的赌博，这使法国企业陷入了长期的阴霾，也为总统七年来将法国转变为投资中心的努力蒙上了阴影。【原文：Emmanuel Macron’s ill-fated June gamble on snap elections has plunged French businesses into prolonged gloom, clouding the president’s seven-year effort to transform the country into a hub for investment.】

item.title: 经济学家称印尼降息可能更慢、更浅
item.description: 据经济学家称，由于全球不确定性使印尼盾的稳定性面临风险，印尼央行可能会放慢基准利率的下调速度并减少下调次数。【原文：Bank Indonesia is likely to pursue slower and fewer cuts to its benchmark interest rate as global uncertainties put rupiah stability at risk, according to economists.】

item.title: 马里在达成 1.6 亿美元交易后释放了 Resolute Mining 公司首席执行官霍洛汉
item.description: Resolute Mining Ltd. 首席执行官特里-霍洛汉（Terry Holohan）和另外两名员工已从马里的拘留所获释，就在几天前，这家金矿开采公司同意支付约 1.6 亿美元，以解决与马里政府的税务纠纷。【原文：Resolute Mining Ltd. said Chief Executive Officer Terry Holohan and two other employees have been released from detention in Mali, just days after the gold mining company agreed to pay about $160 million to resolve a tax dispute with the government.】

item.title: 挪威经济实现2022年以来最快增长，令人惊喜
item.description: 挪威上一季度经济加速增长，达到近两年来的最快速度，这支持了挪威央行将在第一季度开始放宽借贷成本的预期。【原文：Norway’s economy accelerated last quarter to its fastest pace in almost two years, backing expectations that the nation’s central bank will begin easing borrowing costs in the first quarter.】

item.title: 印度央行为外汇政策辩护：印度试图规避全球风险
item.description: 印度中央银行表示，印度正努力保持货币稳定，以确保经济免受全球溢出效应和金融稳定风险的影响。【原文：India is trying to keep its currency stable to ensure the economy is insulated from global spillovers and financial stability risks, according to the nation’s central bank.】

item.title: 泰晤士水务公司被禁止使用客户现金支付奖金
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司将被禁止从客户手中收回去年支付给其老板的 77 万英镑（973,670 美元）奖金。【原文：Thames Water will be blocked from clawing back from customers £770,000 ($973,670) in bonuses paid to its bosses last year.】

item.title: 寻找关税避风港？英国股市或许正是如此
item.description: 当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易威胁令欧洲股市动荡不安，但有一个市场角落看起来相对安全，那就是英国。【原文：As European equities are roiled by President-elect Donald Trump’s trade threats, there’s one corner of the market that looks relatively insulated — Britain.】

item.title: 谁是高塔姆-阿达尼，美国为何指控他行贿？
item.description: 高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）是亚洲最富有的人之一，去年他的财富一度仅次于埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）。现在，他作为亚洲第二富豪的地位受到了威胁，因为美国检察官在 11 月指控他涉嫌行贿，引发了他旗下公司股票的暴跌。2023 年初，纽约投资者兴登堡研究公司（Hindenburg Research）指控阿达尼集团存在股票操纵和会计欺诈行为，阿达尼的财富受到打击。【原文：Gautam Adani is one of Asia’s richest men and at one point last year was second in wealth in the world only to Elon Musk. Now, his spot as Asia’s second-richest person is under threat after US prosecutors charged him in November with suspected bribery, triggering a rout in the stocks of his companies. Adani’s fortunes took a hit in early 2023 after allegations of stock manipulation and accounting fraud at his Adani Group were made by the New York-based investor Hindenburg Research, which at the】

item.title: 比特币创纪录上涨，美国 ETF 资产飙升至逾 1000 亿美元
item.description: 直接投资于比特币的美国交易所交易基金的总资产超过了 1000 亿美元，因为这种原始加密货币延续了破纪录的涨势。【原文：US exchange-traded funds investing directly in Bitcoin surpassed $100 billion in total assets as the original cryptocurrency extended a record-breaking rally.】

item.title: 英国财政部 10 月份借款超过预期 174 亿英镑
item.description: 根据预算案以来的首次公共财政快照，英国政府 10 月份的借贷高于预期。【原文：UK government borrowing came in higher than forecast in October, according to the first snapshot of the public finances since the budget.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市连续两日收红后反弹
诺华以癌症和炎症药物为由上调销售指引
item.description: 诺华公司（Novartis AG）上调了中期销售指导，称对癌症和免疫疾病新药以及神经和心血管疾病治疗的预期乐观。【原文：Novartis AG raised its medium-term sales guidance, citing upbeat expectations for new cancer and immunological disease medicines, as well as treatments for neurological and cardiovascular conditions.】

item.title: 越南和马来西亚寻求缓和南海紧张局势
item.description: 越南和马来西亚同意提升两国关系并探索更紧密的合作，以维护南海和平，此前马来西亚的投诉加剧了南海争议水域的紧张局势。【原文：Vietnam and Malaysia agreed to elevate ties and explore closer cooperation to maintain peace in the South China Sea, after a complaint from Malaysia raised tensions over the contested waters.】

item.title: KKR 领投酒店科技公司 Lighthouse 的 3.7 亿美元融资
item.description: 帮助酒店分析市场需求和房价的初创企业 Lighthouse（兆光科技）在私募股权公司 KKR & Co.【原文：Lighthouse, a startup that helps hotels analyze market demand and rates, has raised about $370 million in a funding round led by private equity firm KKR & Co.】

item.title: 现在是加强对俄罗斯石油制裁的时候了：石油战略
item.description: 彭博社石油策略师朱利安-李（Julian Lee）写道，油价下跌和即将到来的供过于求时期可能会为加强对俄罗斯供应的制裁创造绝佳机会，以至于制裁实际上开始侵蚀克里姆林宫的战利品。【原文：Falling oil prices and an impending period of over-supply could create the perfect opportunity to toughen sanctions on Russian supplies to the point where they actually start to bite into the Kremlin’s war chest, writes Bloomberg oil strategist Julian Lee.】

item.title: 瑞士宝盛称客户资金流入加速，利润上升
item.description: 瑞士宝盛集团（Julius Baer Group Ltd.）表示，预计今年的年度利润将有 "显著 "增长，因为客户资金流入的加速表明人们对这家瑞士财富管理公司的信心有所增强。【原文：Julius Baer Group Ltd. said that it expects a “significant” boost to annual profit this year, as an acceleration in client inflows signaled an improvement of confidence in the Swiss wealth manager.】

item.title: 苏黎世在提前一年实现现有目标后又设定了新目标
item.description: 苏黎世保险集团（Zurich Insurance Group AG）为未来三年的盈利能力和利润增长设定了新的目标，此前好于预期的市场环境使其有望提前一年超过现有的指导目标。【原文：Zurich Insurance Group AG set new targets for profitability and profit growth for the next three years, after a better-than-expected market environment put it on track to exceed its existing guidance a year ahead of plan.】

item.title: 阿达尼的支持者 GQG 的 100 亿美元赌注受到贿赂调查的威胁
item.description: 阿达尼集团（Adani Group）的新麻烦正对总部位于美国的 GQG Partners LLC 构成威胁，该公司在去年遭遇做空者攻击后，逆势押注该企业集团。【原文：Fresh troubles at the Adani Group are posing a threat to US-based GQG Partners LLC, which took a contrarian bet on the conglomerate after a short-seller attack last year.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长维勒鲁瓦认为特朗普关税不会对通胀造成巨大冲击
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）第二次担任总统期间可能出现的贸易征税不会破坏欧洲中央银行的宽松计划。【原文：Potential trade levies during a second Donald Trump presidency wouldn’t derail the European Central Bank’s easing plans, Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】

item.title: 贝恩支持的 Kioxia 计划在东京上市，估值 48 亿美元
item.description: Kioxia Holdings Corp. 计划于 12 月中旬在东京证券交易所上市，估值约为 7,500 亿日元（合 48 亿美元）。【原文：Kioxia Holdings Corp. plans to debut on the Tokyo Stock Exchange in mid-December at a value of about ¥750 billion ($4.8 billion), fast-tracking the move to stay relevant in the competitive memory sector.】

item.title: 达斯称，在通胀得到控制之前，印度央行的工作尚未完成
item.description: 印度央行行长沙克提坎塔-达斯（Shaktikanta Das）表示，印度央行将认为自己的工作尚未完成，直到通胀率持续缓和到 4% 的目标附近。【原文：India’s central bank will consider its job unfinished until inflation moderates around its 4% target on a durable basis, Governor Shaktikanta Das said.】

item.title: 英国股票与通货膨胀的困局
item.description:
只要人们还在谈论物价上涨，物价上涨就会一直是个令人担忧的问题，但英国更担心的应该是停滞不前的股市。【原文：

Price rises will stay a worry as long as people talk about them, but Britain’s bigger concern should be the stagnant stock market.

】

item.title: 股票分析师，将自己的评级从 "卖出 "提升至 "持有 "吧
item.description:
英国重新修订了损害投资研究经济性的错误规则。

仿效美国模式是值得欢迎的第一步。【原文：

The UK has reworked misguided rules that damaged the economics of investment research. Aping the US model is welcome — as a first step.

】

item.title: 爱尔兰大选事关重大？
item.description: 爱尔兰将于 11 月 29 日举行大选，总理西蒙-哈里斯（Simon Harris）希望利用强劲的经济形势再执政五年。【原文：Ireland holds a general election on Nov. 29, with Prime Minister Simon Harris hoping to capitalize on a strong economy to secure another five years in power.】

item.title: 电动汽车持续疲软，欧洲汽车销量停滞不前
item.description: 欧洲汽车销量平平，导致包括福特汽车公司和大众汽车公司在内的制造商纷纷削减成本，以应对低迷的需求。【原文：Car sales in Europe are flatlining, leading manufacturers including Ford Motor Co. and Volkswagen AG to push for cost cuts in response to muted demand.】

item.title: 南非央行因特朗普担忧而暂缓大幅降息：日间指南
item.description: 由于前景面临新的风险，南非储备银行将无视通胀急剧放缓，仅将利率小幅下调四分之一个百分点。【原文：South Africa’s reserve bank is set to look past a sharp slowdown in inflation and only cut interests rates by a modest quarter percentage point, as new risks to its outlook emerge.】
